Address.label: Address
Address.value: 101 WEST PROSPECT AVENUE, CLEVELAND, Ohio, 44115-1075, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Sherwin-Williams is the largest provider of architectural paint in the United States. The company has approximately 4,800 stores and sells premium paint at higher price points than most competitors. Sherwin-Williams also sells paint-related products in big-box stores and provides coatings for original equipment manufacturers.
